short_pt: Site institucional premium com foco em autoridade
short_en: Premium corporate website focused on authority
context_en: A leading educational institution needed a professional online presence to establish credibility and attract more students. Their old website was outdated, lacked modern design, and didn't effectively communicate their expertise in online education.
solution_en: I developed a premium corporate website using modern web technologies, focusing on clean UI/UX design, responsive layout, and strategic content placement. The site includes sections for courses, testimonials, and a contact form, optimized for conversions and SEO.
result_en: The new website significantly improved the institution's online authority, leading to a 40% increase in inquiries and a more professional brand image that attracts international students.
cta_en: Contact me to elevate your business with a premium website that drives results!

context_en: A tech startup required a robust SaaS platform to manage user subscriptions and data analytics. Their existing system was inefficient, leading to high operational costs and poor user experience.
solution_en: I built a modern, scalable SaaS platform using cloud technologies, implementing user dashboards, payment integrations, and real-time analytics. The platform features secure authentication, automated billing, and a responsive design for seamless access across devices.
result_en: The new platform reduced operational costs by 30%, improved user retention by 50%, and enabled the startup to scale rapidly, attracting more enterprise clients.
cta_en: Let me help you build a scalable SaaS platform that grows with your business!

context_en: A medical clinic struggled with low patient inquiries despite high-quality services. Their landing page was cluttered, lacked clear calls-to-action, and didn't highlight their unique value propositions.
solution_en: I redesigned the landing page with a focus on conversion optimization, incorporating persuasive copy, strategic CTAs, testimonials, and a simple booking form. The design emphasizes trust, urgency, and benefits, with mobile-first responsiveness.
result_en: The new landing page increased patient inquiries by 60%, improved conversion rates, and positioned the clinic as a trusted healthcare provider in the community.
cta_en: Transform your landing page into a conversion machine – contact me today!

context_en: A data-driven company needed an intuitive analytics dashboard to monitor key metrics. Their previous tools were complex and not user-friendly, hindering decision-making processes.
solution_en: I created a custom analytics dashboard with interactive visualizations, real-time data updates, and customizable reports. Using modern UI/UX principles, the dashboard includes charts, filters, and export options for easy data analysis.
result_en: The dashboard improved data accessibility, leading to faster insights and a 25% increase in operational efficiency, empowering the company to make informed strategic decisions.
cta_en: Get actionable insights with a custom analytics dashboard – let's build yours!

short_pt: Designs diversos: flyers, logos, banners e materiais gráficos
short_en: Various designs: flyers, logos, banners and graphic materials
context_en: A local business needed cohesive graphic materials to enhance their brand presence. Their existing designs were inconsistent, failing to communicate professionalism and attract customers.
solution_en: I delivered a comprehensive suite of graphic designs, including logos, flyers, banners, and promotional materials. Each piece was crafted with attention to brand consistency, color psychology, and visual hierarchy to maximize impact.
result_en: The new designs strengthened the brand identity, increased customer engagement by 35%, and positioned the business as a professional leader in their industry.
cta_en: Elevate your brand with stunning graphic design – reach out to get started!

short_pt: Identidade visual completa, com apresentação organizada para mostrar valor
short_en: Complete visual identity with a presentation organized to show value
context_en: A creative agency required a complete brand identity overhaul to differentiate themselves in a competitive market. Their previous branding lacked cohesion and failed to convey their innovative spirit.
solution_en: I developed a full brand identity package, including logo design, color palettes, typography, and brand guidelines. The identity was presented in an organized portfolio showcasing its application across various media, ensuring versatility and impact.
result_en: The new brand identity enhanced market positioning, increased client inquiries by 45%, and established the agency as a go-to for creative solutions.
cta_en: Build a strong brand identity that stands out – contact me for your project!

short_pt: Site moderno para barbearia com agendamento e portfolio
short_en: Modern barber shop website with booking and portfolio
context_en: A traditional barber shop wanted to modernize their operations and attract younger clients. They lacked an online presence, making it difficult to showcase services and manage appointments efficiently.
solution_en: I created a modern website featuring an online booking system, service portfolio, customer testimonials, and responsive design. The site includes integrated scheduling, payment options, and social media links to enhance customer engagement.
result_en: The website boosted online bookings by 70%, improved customer satisfaction, and positioned the barber shop as a contemporary, tech-savvy business in the local market.
cta_en: Modernize your business with a stunning online presence – let's get started!
